creator: James Brault
descriptionHtml:
EZBuzzer provides a wireless, easy, and free solution to any activity involving knowing who was first to respond to many various scenarios. All that is required is one person to act as a host or moderator, and then up to 20 players can join!

The first player to "buzz in" shows up as green on both his device, and to the Host; the rest of the players are then locked from answering until the Host "clears" to allow more buzzing.

The app optionally can keep track of player scores, and you can customize the value of right or wrong answers.

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, game nights, or classroom activities! Replace bulky wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth, so your device needs to support that. Initial start-up is simple: One person should sign on as a Host, and then all others as Players. Players will automatically connect to the Host, and then the fun can begin!

More than one game going on nearby? Players can always change to a different Host if needed.

EZBuzzer does include a small ad at the bottom for players; in the future a paid opt-out may become available if there is demand.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!
descriptionShort: Wireless Buzzer System for Quiz Bowl, College Bowl, Trivia Games, or home fun!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, game nights, or classroom activities! Replace bulky wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth - no hassle with joining a WiFi network or dropped WiFi signals. Initial start-up is simple: One person should sign on as a Host, and then all others as Players. Players will automatically connect to the Host, and then the fun can begin!

More than one game going on nearby? Players can always change to a different Host if needed.

EZBuzzer does include a small ad at the top for players; in the future a paid opt-out may become available if there is demand.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!

title: EZBuzzer: Wireless Game Buzzer Lockout System

creator: James Brault
descriptionHtml:
EZBuzzer provides a wireless, easy, and free solution to any activity involving knowing who was first to respond. All that is required is one person to act as a host or moderator, and then up to 20 players can join from their devices...no WiFi required!

The first Player to "buzz in" shows up as green on both his device, and to the Host; the rest of the players are then locked from answering until the Host clears or awards points, and allows more buzzing.

You can keep track of scores, and customize the value of right or wrong answers. You can group players into teams, and track scores by both player and by team! You can even add a Game Timer to know when your game is done! Short on people? One person can serve as both the Player *and* the Host, awarding points while still being able to buzz in!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, games such as Jeopardy or Family Feud, or classroom activities! Replace bulky wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth - no hassle with joining a WiFi network or dropped WiFi signals. Initial start-up is simple: One person should sign on as a Host or PlayerHost, and then all others as Players. Players will automatically connect to the Host, and then the fun can begin!

More than one game going on nearby? Players can always change to a different Host if needed.

EZBuzzer does include a small ad at the top for players; in the future a paid opt-out may become available if there is demand.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!
descriptionShort: Bluetooth Buzzer for Quiz Bowl, College Bowl, Trivia Games, or home fun!

You can keep track of scores, and customize the value of right or wrong answers. You can group players into teams, and track scores by both player and by team! You can even add a Game Timer to know when your game is done! Short on people? One person can serve as both the Player *and* the Host, awarding points while still being able to buzz in!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, games such as Jeopardy or Family Feud, or classroom activities! Replace bulky wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth - no hassle with joining a WiFi network or dropped WiFi signals. Initial start-up is simple: One person should sign on as a Host or PlayerHost, and then all others as Players. Players will automatically connect to the Host, and then the fun can begin!

More than one game going on nearby? Players can always change to a different Host if needed.

EZBuzzer does include a small ad at the top for players; in the future a paid opt-out may become available if there is demand.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!
descriptionShort: Bluetooth Buzzer for Quiz Bowl, College Bowl, Trivia Games, or home fun!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bugfix avoid crash if user pauses app during initial startup

title: EZBuzzer: Wireless Game Buzzer & Lockout System

creator: Braultomatic Innovations
descriptionHtml:
EZBuzzer provides a wireless, easy, and free solution to any game where multiple players in the same room need to "ring in" to respond. All that is required is one person to act as a host or moderator, and then up to 20 players can join from their devices...no WiFi required! This app does NOT contain any questions, but it DOES allow you to add a way to "Buzz In", award points, and/or keep time for any game which calls for it.

The first player to signal shows up as green on both his device and to the Host; the rest of the players are then locked from answering until the Host clears, awards points, and allows more buzzing.

You can keep track of scores, and customize the value of right or wrong answers. You can group players into teams, and track scores by both player and by team. You can add optional Bonus Points if your game calls for it. You can even add a Game Timer to know when your game is done! Short on people? One person can serve as both the Player *and* the Host, awarding points while still being able to buzz in!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, games such as Jeopardy or Family Feud, or classroom activities! Replace messy wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge to your game instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth - no hassle with joining a WiFi network or dropped WiFi signals. Initial start-up is simple: One person should sign on as a Host or PlayerHost, and then all others as Players. Players will automatically connect to the Host, and then the fun can begin! As this game is Bluetooth-based, players should be nearby...this is an app to play with your friends or family together!

EZBuzzer does include a small ad at the top for players; in the future a paid opt-out may become available if there is demand.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!
descriptionShort: Bluetooth Buzzer for Jeopardy, Family Feud, Quiz Bowl or any buzzer-based game.

title: EZBuzzer: Wireless Game Buzzer & Lockout System

creator: Braultomatic Innovations
descriptionHtml:
Looking for a Jeopardy Buzzer, Family Feud Buzzer, Quiz Bowl Buzzer, Trivia Buzzer, or playing any kind of game where a buzzer is needed to decide who rang in first? This app is a wireless, easy, and free solution, and no WiFi is required for buzzer use! One person plays as a Host, and then up to 20 other devices can join via Bluetooth as Players. This app does NOT contain any questions, but it DOES allow you to add a way to "Buzz In", award points, and/or keep time to any game which calls for it.

The first Player to signal shows up as green on both his device and to the Host; the rest of the Players are then locked from answering until the Host clears, awards points, and allows more buzzing.

You can keep track of scores, and customize the value of right or wrong answers. You can group players into teams, and track scores by both player and by team. You can add optional Bonus Points if your game calls for it. You can even add a Game Timer to know when your game is done! Short on people? One person can serve as both the Player *and* the Host, awarding points while still being able to buzz in!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, games such as Jeopardy or Family Feud, or classroom activities! Replace messy wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge to your game instead of guessing who was first!

As this game is Bluetooth-based, players should be nearby...this is an app to play with your friends or family together!

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!

This app does NOT contain any questions, but it DOES allow you to add a way to "Buzz In", award points, and/or keep time to any game which calls for it.

The first Player to signal shows up as green on both his device and to the Host; the rest of the Players are then locked from answering until the Host clears, awards points, and allows more buzzing.

You can keep track of scores, and customize the value of right or wrong answers. You can group players into teams, and track scores by both player and by team. You can add optional Bonus Points if your game calls for it. You can even add a Game Timer to know when your game is done! Short on people? One person can serve as both the Player *and* the Host, awarding points while still being able to buzz in!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, games such as Jeopardy or Family Feud, or classroom activities! Replace messy wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge to your game instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth - no hassle with joining a WiFi network or dropped WiFi signals. Initial start-up is simple: One person should sign on as a Host or PlayerHost, and then all others as Players. Players will automatically connect to the Host, and then the fun can begin! As this game is Bluetooth-based, players should be nearby...this is an app to play with your friends or family together! Don't like ads? You can remove them easily for a small one-time fee.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!

title: EZBuzzer: Wireless Game Buzzer

creator: Braultomatic Innovations
descriptionHtml:
Looking for a Jeopardy Buzzer, Family Feud Buzzer, Quiz Bowl Buzzer, Trivia Buzzer, or playing any kind of game where a buzzer is needed to decide who rang in first? This app is a wireless, easy, and free solution, and no WiFi is required for buzzer use! One person plays as a Host, and then up to 20 other devices can join via Bluetooth as Players. This app does NOT contain any questions, but it DOES allow you to add a way to "Buzz In", award points, and/or keep time to any game which calls for it.

The first Player to signal shows up as green on both his device and to the Host; the rest of the Players are then locked from answering until the Host clears, awards points, and allows more buzzing.

You can keep track of scores, and customize the value of right or wrong answers. You can group players into teams, and track scores by both player and by team. You can add optional Bonus Points if your game calls for it. You can even add a Game Timer to know when your game is done! Short on people? One person can serve as both the Player *and* the Host, awarding points while still being able to buzz in!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, games such as Jeopardy or Family Feud, or classroom activities! Replace messy wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge to your game instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth - no hassle with joining a WiFi network or dropped WiFi signals. Initial start-up is simple: One person should sign on as a Host or PlayerHost, and then all others as Players. Players will automatically connect to the Host, and then the fun can begin! As this game is Bluetooth-based, players should be nearby...this is an app to play with your friends or family together! Don't like ads? You can remove them easily for a small one-time fee.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!

This app does NOT contain any questions, but it DOES allow you to add a way to "Buzz In", award points, and/or keep time to any game which calls for it.

The first Player to signal shows up as green on both his device and to the Host; the rest of the Players are then locked from answering until the Host clears, awards points, and allows more buzzing.

You can keep track of scores, and customize the value of right or wrong answers. You can group players into teams, and track scores by both player and by team. You can add optional Bonus Points if your game calls for it. You can even add a Game Timer to know when your game is done! Short on people? One person can serve as both the Player *and* the Host, awarding points while still being able to buzz in!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, games such as Jeopardy or Family Feud, or classroom activities! Replace messy wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge to your game instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth - no hassle with joining a WiFi network or dropped WiFi signals. Initial start-up is simple: One person should sign on as a Host or PlayerHost, and then all others as Players. Players will automatically connect to the Host, and then the fun can begin! As this game is Bluetooth-based, players should be nearby...this is an app to play with your friends or family together! Don't like ads? You can remove them easily for a small one-time fee.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!

title: EZBuzzer: Wireless Game Buzzer

creator: Braultomatic Innovations
descriptionHtml:
Looking for a Jeopardy Buzzer, Family Feud Buzzer, Quiz Bowl Buzzer, Trivia Buzzer, or playing any kind of game where a buzzer is needed to decide who rang in first? This app is a wireless, easy, and free solution, and no WiFi is required for buzzer use! One person plays as a Host, and then up to 20 other devices can join via Bluetooth as Players. This app does NOT contain any questions, but it DOES allow you to add a way to "Buzz In", award points, and/or keep time to any game which calls for it.

The first Player to signal shows up as green on both his device and to the Host; the rest of the Players are then locked from answering until the Host clears, awards points, and allows more buzzing.

You can keep track of scores, and customize the value of right or wrong answers. You can group players into teams, and track scores by both player and by team. You can add optional Bonus Points if your game calls for it. You can even add a Game Timer to know when your game is done! Short on people? One person can serve as both the Player *and* the Host, awarding points while still being able to buzz in!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, games such as Jeopardy or Family Feud, or classroom activities! Replace messy wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge to your game instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth - no hassle with joining a WiFi network or dropped WiFi signals. As this game is Bluetooth-based, players should be nearby...this is an app to play with your friends or family together! Don't like ads? You can remove them easily for a small one-time fee.

EZBuzzer is also available on other platforms, and all versions are compatible and can be used together.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!

The first Player to signal shows up as green on both his device and to the Host; the rest of the Players are then locked from answering until the Host clears, awards points, and allows more buzzing.

You can keep track of scores, and customize the value of right or wrong answers. You can group players into teams, and track scores by both player and by team. You can add optional Bonus Points if your game calls for it. You can even add a Game Timer to know when your game is done! Short on people? One person can serve as both the Player *and* the Host, awarding points while still being able to buzz in!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, games such as Jeopardy or Family Feud, or classroom activities! Replace messy wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge to your game instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth - no hassle with joining a WiFi network or dropped WiFi signals. Initial start-up is simple: One person should sign on as a Host or PlayerHost, and then all others as Players. Players will automatically connect to the Host, and then the fun can begin! As this game is Bluetooth-based, players should be nearby...this is an app to play with your friends or family together! Don't like ads? You can remove them easily for a small one-time fee.

EZBuzzer is also available on other platforms, and all versions are compatible and can be used together.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!

title: EZBuzzer: Wireless Game Buzzer

creator: Braultomatic Innovations
descriptionHtml:
Looking for a Jeopardy Buzzer, Family Feud Buzzer, Quiz Bowl Buzzer, Trivia Buzzer, or playing any kind of game where a buzzer is needed to decide who rang in first? This app is a wireless, easy, and free solution, and no WiFi is required for buzzer use! One person plays as a Host, and then up to 10 other devices can join via Bluetooth as Players. This app does NOT contain any questions, but it DOES allow you to add a way to "Buzz In", award points, and/or keep time to any game which calls for it.

The first Player to signal shows up as green on both his device and to the Host; the rest of the Players are then locked from answering until the Host clears, awards points, and allows more buzzing.

You can keep track of scores, and customize the value of right or wrong answers. You can group players into teams, and track scores by both player and by team. You can add optional Bonus Points if your game calls for it. You can even add a Game Timer to know when your game is done! Short on people? One person can serve as both the Player *and* the Host, awarding points while still being able to buzz in!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, games such as Jeopardy or Family Feud, or classroom activities! Replace messy wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge to your game instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth - no hassle with joining a WiFi network or dropped WiFi signals. As this game is Bluetooth-based, players should be nearby...this is an app to play with your friends or family together! Don't like ads? You can remove them easily for a small one-time fee.

EZBuzzer is also available on other platforms, and all versions are compatible and can be used together.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!

The first Player to signal shows up as green on both his device and to the Host; the rest of the Players are then locked from answering until the Host clears, awards points, and allows more buzzing.

You can keep track of scores, and customize the value of right or wrong answers. You can group players into teams, and track scores by both player and by team. You can add optional Bonus Points if your game calls for it. You can even add a Game Timer to know when your game is done! Short on people? One person can serve as both the Player *and* the Host, awarding points while still being able to buzz in!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, games such as Jeopardy or Family Feud, or classroom activities! Replace messy wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge to your game instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth - no hassle with joining a WiFi network or dropped WiFi signals. Initial start-up is simple: One person should sign on as a Host or PlayerHost, and then all others as Players. Players will automatically connect to the Host, and then the fun can begin! As this game is Bluetooth-based, players should be nearby...this is an app to play with your friends or family together! Don't like ads? You can remove them easily for a small one-time fee.

EZBuzzer is also available on other platforms, and all versions are compatible and can be used together.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!

descriptionHtml:
Looking for a Jeopardy Buzzer, Family Feud Buzzer, Quiz Bowl Buzzer, Trivia Buzzer, or playing any kind of game where a buzzer is needed to decide who rang in first? This app is a wireless, easy, and free solution, and no WiFi is required for buzzer use! One person plays as a Host, and then up to 15 other devices can join via Bluetooth as Players. This app does NOT contain any questions, but it DOES allow you to add a way to "Buzz In", award points, and/or keep time to any game which calls for it.

The first Player to signal shows up as green on both his device and to the Host; the rest of the Players are then locked from answering until the Host clears, awards points, and allows more buzzing.

You can keep track of scores, and customize the value of right or wrong answers. You can group players into teams, and track scores by both player and by team. You can add optional Bonus Points if your game calls for it. You can even add a Game Timer to know when your game is done! Short on people? One person can serve as both the Player *and* the Host, awarding points while still being able to buzz in!

EZBuzzer could be used for Pub Trivia, Quiz Bowl / College Bowl, games such as Jeopardy or Family Feud, or classroom activities! Replace messy wired buzzer systems with ease...or add an impartial judge to your game instead of guessing who was first!

EZBuzzer works over Bluetooth - no hassle with joining a WiFi network or dropped WiFi signals. Initial start-up is simple: One person should sign on as a Host or PlayerHost, and then all others as Players. Players will automatically connect to the Host, and then the fun can begin! As this game is Bluetooth-based, players should be nearby...this is an app to play with your friends or family together! Don't like ads? You can remove them easily for a small one-time fee.

EZBuzzer is also available on other platforms, and all versions are compatible and can be used together.

Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!
descriptionShort: Bluetooth-based signaling app for Jeopardy, Family Feud, or any trivia game
